will start at the last 2 rows.
Then its disruption will go 1 row
higher each time

name: Raichu
disruptions:
Board: Pikachu, Pichu, Raichu in Barrier in
          1st, 3rd, and 5th column
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 2-3 Barriers every 3 turns
recommendedParty:
[Any]

Donphan, Phanpy,
Cubone, Pikachu,
Pichu, Raichu

None
clearingStrategy:
Get your Pikachu family here. In my
opinion , 1 is enough (I'll pick Pichu
because it always appear on the top)
Also note that Audino, Kangaskhan
can clear out the Barrier. Do not use
Sableye.
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 6 moves left
Move+5 or S-Rank it later with a stronger
team. Or Mega Start Audino, Kangaskhan,
or Altaria

name: Mega Ampharos
disruptions:
Board : Last 4 Rows in Barrier
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 5 Flaaffy after 4 turns.
          Adds 5 Barriers every 3 turns.
recommendedParty:
[Lopunny]/[Lucario]

Donphan, Cubone,
Phanpy, Stunfisk,
Marowak, Excadrill

None

Groudon, Garchomp
clearingStrategy:
Bring either Lopunny or Lucario.
Any other Mega are not good at this
stage. You basically want to clear 
barrier as possible for combos

I dont recommend M-Garchomp on this
stage. Even with Mega Start, its Mega
Effect will only affect the same tiles
and you have to deal with unaffected
barriers manually
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 10 moves left
Move+5 if you are having trouble +
stronger team or Mega Start Lopunny to 
clear 3 column of barrier really fast
